Entries.cc_Minecart: Somehow, the old town minecart system started working again. It's very convenient for getting to and from the mines.#$b#Don't get too cosy, though... if it can start up so suddenly, it could just as well shut down...
Entries.Sat6: Damn it, I'm too old to do anything exciting any more. All I have to look forward to is years and years of sweaty, hot furnace-work.
Entries.Sun8: I don't know if people realise this, or care, but I do take a lot of pride in my work.#$e#I mean... When I was a boy I didn't really dream of becoming a blacksmith. But that's what I am. And I want to be the best blacksmith I can be.
